{"step_by_step_thinking": "The active management of the third stage of labor for the prevention of postpartum hemorrhage (PPH) includes several interventions. Let's go through each option to determine if it is part of active management. A. Direct injection of oxytocin after delivery of anterior shoulder is part of active management. B. Constant controlled cord traction is part of active management. C. Early cord clamping and cutting is part of active management. D. Prophylactic misoprostol is also part of active management. Therefore, all of the options listed are part of the active management of the third stage of labor for the prevention of PPH. None of the options are excluded.", "answer_choice": "None of the above"}
